snippet: The three-way agreement among Hachette, Perseus and the book distributor Ingram had been in the works since February and was announced in late June.
abstract: Hachette Book Group's acquisition of independent publisher Perseus falls apart following months of negotiations; three-way agreement involving Hachette, Perseus and book distributor Ingram proved to be too complex to complete.
lead_paragraph: The three-way agreement among Hachette, Perseus and the book distributor Ingram had been in the works since February and was announced in late June.

headline.main: Publisher Hachette’s 3-Way Deal to Acquire Perseus Fails
headline.print_headline: Publisher Hachette’s 3-Way Deal to Acquire Perseus Fails
